definition: Ming Dynasty (1368-1644)/surname Ming/Ming (c. 2000 BC), fourth of the legendary Flame Emperors, 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
bright/opposite: dark 暗[an4]/(of meaning) clear/to understand/next/public or open/wise/generic term for a sacrifice to the gods

sentences.english: When her statement was read a very cleat light was cast upon the situation.
sentences.chinese: 她的声明宣读后，情况便显得非常清楚了。

sentences.english: Ono released a statement Tuesday night in tribute to Lennon.
sentences.chinese: 小野周二晚上发表的一份声明中赞扬侬。

sentences.english: This afternoon Tietz declared the letter to be a forgery.
sentences.chinese: 当天下午Tietz声明信件是伪造的。

sentences.english: Their statement was a downright inanity.
sentences.chinese: 他们的声明是彻头彻尾的废话。

sentences.english: Office of National Development and Reform Commission …
sentences.chinese: 改革委资环司郑重声明。

sentences.english: 'Protestations' that the company isn't affiliated with the Chinese military aren't enough, he said.
sentences.chinese: 仅仅郑重声明公司和中国军方没有联系还不够。

sentences.english: The leadership issued a statement denying any favoritism.
sentences.chinese: 公约领导层发表一份声明表示否认有任何偏袒。

sentences.english: The companies say OMP is safe and FDA-approved.
sentences.chinese: 那家公司声明OMP是安全的且经FDA认证。

sentences.english: The solemn statement was featured in full in the newspapers.
sentences.chinese: 各报全文刊登了这一庄严的声明。

sentences.english: Li Jianxi of SamSung group president releases outgiving to express yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 三星集团董事长李健熙昨日发布公开声明表示。

sentences.english: Europeans simply stole everything and claimed it as their own idea or invention.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲人窃为己用还声明是自己的想法或发明。

sentences.english: The character used to end a sub-expression declaration.
sentences.chinese: 用于结束一个子表达式声明的字符。

sentences.english: The new government will then deliver its policy statement before parliament.
sentences.chinese: 然后，新政府将在国会之前递交其政策声明。

sentences.english: Experts in the U.S. and allied governments find these denials hard to believe.
sentences.chinese: 美国及其同盟国的专家觉得这些声明不值得相信。

sentences.english: At the end of the statement, Mr To bowed in apology.
sentences.chinese: 发表声明后，涂谨申鞠躬道歉。

definition: clear (of liquid)/limpid/to clarify/to make sth clear/to be clear (about the facts)
to settle (of liquid)/to become clear (by precipitation of impurities)/precipitate (chemistry)/to put in order/to quell disturbances
this text/article/the main body of a book
to declare one's position/to say where one stands
to release/to issue/to announce/to distribute/also written 發布|发布[fa1 bu4]
to forward (a shipment)/to reprint sth published elsewhere/Taiwan pr. [zhuan3 zai4]
